pluralize

public static java.lang.String pluralize(java.lang.String str,
                                         int num)
Returns the proper pluralization of the given string noun

Parameters:
str - The string noun (singular)
num - The amount describing the noun
Returns:
The noun in singular if num is equal to 1; otherwise, appends an "s" to make it plural.
